title: FEATURE JOBS: LESSONS, Glitch Productions, Poster Magazine, The Creative Store + More
text:
LESSONS are hiring for a Manager – Fashion Retail (PER) to manage the team. This is a varied role in which you will utilise your skillset to tackle a range of challenges each day. To be considered for this role you must have 1+ year of Fashion Retail experience. Find out more.

Glitch Productions are recruiting for a highly capable and diligent Rigging/Technical Artist (SYD) to work on their animation series. You will be responsible for making high quality rigs, simulations and particle effects to be used by the production team. Apply now.

Poster Magazine seek a talented and versatile Writer (SYD, MEL, PER, BRIS) to work part-time reporting to the Chief Deputy Editor in their Sydney HQ. This is a key role as it will mean copy contribution across their magazines, website and social media channels. Check it out.

The Creative Store are on the hunt for a Full-Stack Designer (SYD). The ideal candidate will have demonstrated experience as a Digital Designer with front end development skills including HTML, CSS, & jQuery. Find out more.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

Umart Online are recruiting for a Graphic Designer/Content Coordinator (BRIS) to play a crucial role in ensuring their website is as descriptive as possible to ensure customers can make an informed choice. Apply now.

Oraco Agency are hiring for a Social Media Manager (MEL) who can think on their feet, respond to trends, and truly create outstanding social media content and campaigns. Check it out.

The Creative Nursery seek an Account Executive/Account Manager (SYD) to play a key role in supporting the rest of the team to deliver some pretty awesome marketing campaigns. Find out more.
